title: PBE Account
body: I was just wondering, After realizing I am approaching a year of waiting for a PBE account, if there was anything I could do to better my chances of getting one? It never really bothered me until a friend of mine got one after a 3 week wait and barely ever plays.

replies.body:
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} I definitely feel you here bro. 

We typically choose people for PBE based on what we're currently testing. For example, when we were testing the Galio rework we probably invited a lot of Galio mains to make sure he got plenty of testing. You can also read up on how we pick summoners on our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).
